lines: Justin McElroy

speaker: Episode 5
lines: Here There Be Gerblins - Chapter 5

speaker: Griffin
lines: Previously, on The Adventure Zone…

speaker: Griffin
lines: The door opens, and exiting from it is a young orc woman, who is holding the biggest crossbow any of you have ever seen.

speaker: Taako
lines: What’s your name, dear?

speaker: Killian
lines: My name is Killian.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Lying precariously close to the edge of the pit, you see the one, the only Gundren Rockseeker.

speaker: Clint
lines: Gundren…

speaker: Justin
lines: Gundren!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And across from her is a drow, a dark elf.

speaker: Taako
lines: Who are you?

speaker: Black Spider
lines: I’m… I’m the Black Spider.

speaker: Taako
lines: What is your— What’s your Christian name?

speaker: Black Spider
lines: It’s Brian, darling. Don’t tell me— are you here also for the [garbled static noise]?

speaker: Magnus
lines: No…?

speaker: Justin
lines: I shout,

speaker: Taako
lines: Abraca-fuck-you!

speaker: Justin
lines: And I cast Magic Missile at him.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Black Spider
lines: I’m going to die now…

speaker: Announcer
lines: I’ll drink up all the potions that you’ve got on your shelf, so just let me introduce myself. It’s The Adventure Zone!

speaker: [Theme music
lines: Déjà Vu by Mort Garson]

speaker: Justin
lines: Is— so there’s a big door, is that the only exit the one that—

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah well I’ll set up the scene. I’ll start with some word magic.

speaker: Griffin
lines: That’s just how I like to—

speaker: Travis
lines: Word-o-mancy.

speaker: Griffin
lines: So the three of you have just finished a very intense battle with—

speaker: Travis
lines: We’re all eating a powerbar, drinking some gatorade.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’re eating some Luna Bars to just like, get your vitamins, your minerals, essential… oils, all from these wonderful Luna Bars. This week’s episode is sponsored by Luna Bars. They’re like Clif Bars, but… they won’t make you as constipated. So you’ve just finished this battle. Killian comes out from— she was hiding behind the open, giant iron-wrought door because she had been disarmed. She walks out and sort of surveys the scene. And you can tell she is incredibly impressed. She says,

speaker: Killian
lines: I cannot believe… you guys pulled that off. The— Brian, Magic Brian, is one of the most accomplished, powerful wizards I have ever met in all of my days. I— I am flabbergasted, frankly, that we all did not perish.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Yep.

speaker: Taako
lines: Well you’re welcome, I guess. I guess we’re pretty much rad.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She walks over to the edge of the pit and looks down and goes,

speaker: Killian
lines: Um. Uh. If you’ll excuse me, I need to recover something very quickly. None of you go anywhere.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She looks at all of you and Gundren.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Hold up, hold up. Before— alright, Killian. Before you go anywhere, what is all of this about?

speaker: Killian
lines: I promise I will tell you as soon as I am literally able to. Right- right now I— I— I absolutely can’t. It’s not that—

speaker: Magnus
lines: [Crosstalk] Sounds legit.

speaker: Killian
lines: I want to—

speaker: Taako
lines: Now listen, I have a little bit of um, um, uh, expertise with the magics. I’m assuming this is some sort of a… curse? That’s preventing, uh [crosstalk] further discussion from taking place.

speaker: Killian
lines: [Crosstalk] You’re not even— you’re super, super wrong. You’re like super, duper wrong.

speaker: Taako
lines: Listen, lemme roll to see if I’m right.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Oh, it just—

speaker: Taako
lines: [Rolls] It came up R!

speaker: Griffin
lines: I’m looking—

speaker: Taako
lines: It came up R for right!

speaker: Griffin
lines: She reaches into her sack and pulls out a feather duster, and she says,

speaker: Killian
lines: BRB!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And taps herself with it, and—

speaker: Justin
lines: Sorry, just to clarify, does she say “BRB”?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, she says “BRB!”

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay. Brrrrbp!

speaker: Griffin
lines: “AFK!” She taps herself with the feather duster and is, uh, her silhouette is sort of surrounded by a faint gray light and she jumps into the pit. And you see her as long as you can see her before she is enveloped by the pit. She’s falling very slowly.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay, I turn to Taako and Merle,

speaker: Magnus
lines: Okay, here’s the thing, fellas. There’s definitely something that— there’s a thing that they’re talking about that we can’t, like, mentally comprehend, right? I have—

speaker: Taako
lines: Alright.

speaker: Magnus
lines: We have to find out what’s going on. There’s some other level to this cave. Why did they need his blood, what is going on?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Gundren stands up, he’s bedraggled, and he says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: I might be able to elucidate you.

speaker: Taako
lines: Oh thank goodness.

speaker: Clint
lines: What’s his health condition?

speaker: Gundren
lines: Bad, it’s very bad.

speaker: Travis
lines: He also smokes two packs a day.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I— I drink MGD 64—

speaker: Travis
lines: Oh no.

speaker: Gundren
lines: Three— I drink a six-pack a day and then I eat the bottles. I’m real fucked up over here.

speaker: Travis
lines: “I’ve been eating corning insulation for years.”

speaker: Griffin
lines: Then he says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: But, you guys have done well. Much better than, I’ll be honest, much better than I thought you were. This job has brought some unforeseen circumstances but you guys followed through, and— where’s Barry, by the way?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Oh, he’s good.

speaker: Merle
lines: He’s hanging out back at the bar.

speaker: Gundren
lines: Typical Barry, right?

speaker: Merle
lines: [Chuckles] That’s Barry.

speaker: Magnus
lines: He said he had to wait for his order of chicken wings and then he’d meet right up with us.

speaker: Gundren
lines: That motherfucker loves him some chicken waaangs. Uh, just uh, I might need your help still. Come with me.

speaker: Justin
lines: Can I ask an out-of-character question? Why does no one besides Griffin and I have character voices? It would really make this a whole lot easier.

speaker: Travis
lines: I am my character voice.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Crosstalk] And a whole lot less unlistenable. That’s just what— Travis sounds like Magnus!

speaker: Travis
lines: Yep.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And Dad’s—

speaker: Travis
lines: Well I would— I think you’d find that Magnus and Travis have a lot in common.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, sure. Vis-a-vis battleaxes.

speaker: Travis
lines: And love of dogs.

speaker: Griffin
lines: So Gundren leads you through these giant open iron-wrought doors, which opens up into a large chamber where Renee the jackhammer-bot was being stored.

speaker: Travis
lines: Mmhm.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And through another smaller, more normal set of doors, and into a very short tunnel that opens up into another room, that is— the defining feature I would say— of which is on the far wall a large round metal door. And this one looks a little bit more complicated than the one that you just passed through. This one has some gears peeking through sort of the metal casing of the door. It looks like a pretty sophisticated contraption. And I want all of you to make perception checks.

speaker: Travis
lines: Wait… 12.

speaker: Justin
lines: Natural 18 plus… 3, 21.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Mkay, Taako, in the corner of this room, you actually see a figure that is sort of huddled down and as you approach it, you can kind of get a better appraisal of what this figure is. It is a skeleton [Travis Okay.], that is sort of sitting comfortably. It looks like it was positioned comfortably in the corner of this room, just sitting with its back up against the wall. It is draped in a bright, crimson robe and holding what looks to be some sort of cane, with a, you know, curled end in one hand that is a bit obscured by its robe, it’s a bit tucked into its robe. But it’s just sitting there, but whoever this was they have been dead for a very long time. And Gundren kind of just looks at that figure and walks over to the door and starts starts looking. Looking at it, looking inside the machinery, seeing what he can do.

speaker: Travis
lines: Griffy, do we need to roll to see how comfortably he’s sitting?

speaker: Griffin
lines: He looks like he was chill. It looked like he maybe just sort of sat here, and was kicking it, and just sort of wasted away.

speaker: Justin
lines: Is it— are there any clothes or anything besides just the bones there? Or is there any like distinguishing—

speaker: Griffin
lines: That’s what’s weird, it’s just the robe. Any clothes that this person had on is gone. It’s just the robe and the cane that it’s holding.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay I wanna check out the robe. I’ll search the robe for any clues or anything.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You look over the robe, it just seems to be a plain robe. You can’t really figure out how it survived when the rest of this person’s clothing sort of eroded away but there are— there’s nothing tucked away in the pockets or anything.

speaker: Travis
lines: Where’s the skeleton looking?

speaker: Griffin
lines: The skeleton is actually looking toward the entrance that you guys walked in through.

speaker: Clint
lines: Can I check out the cane?

speaker: Griffin
lines: You can, sure. What are you doing?

speaker: Justin
lines: I haven’t told him about this guy yet.

speaker: Griffin
lines: That’s a good point. Justin— Taako is the only one who’s sort of seen this figure.

speaker: Taako
lines: [In Justin’s voice] Dad, there’s a guy over here with a cane.

speaker: Clint
lines: Is your father here?

speaker: Travis
lines: [Simultaneously] He’s your dad?

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Taako
lines: Uhh, excuse me, whichever one you are, the d… dwarf, there’s a cane here to look at.

speaker: Merle
lines: [In a raspy, high voice] Oh, I’ll check it out.

speaker: Taako
lines: No, that won’t do.

speaker: [Griffin and Travis laugh, Clint makes a wacky noise]
Taako
lines: The sounds— no, the mouth words that you just made there can’t be a sound I’m exposed—

speaker: Merle
lines: [The same voice] How come you can have a voice but I can’t?

speaker: Taako
lines: I have to sit next to you.

speaker: Merle
lines: [Continues] But you’re sitting next to me!

speaker: Taako
lines: I’m literally sit next to you, I can’t—

speaker: Merle
lines: [Continues] Blah, blah, blah.

speaker: Taako
lines: I can’t handle that. Literally.

speaker: Merle
lines: [In a smooth, deep voice] Alright enough of this, I’ll go check out the cave.

speaker: Taako
lines: It’s getting worse.

speaker: Taako
lines: Now you’re Tom’s of Maine. I don’t need a, uh, that voice, nothing, none of it.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay while Laverne and Shirley argue in the corner, I’m gonna—

speaker: Clint
lines: I’m gonna check out the cane!

speaker: Justin
lines: He’s gonna check out the cane, uh, I— can I— Griffin, this is a weird question so I will ask it to you. Is there— are there like— is there any way to know if there’s like, the robe’s worth taking with me like if there’s stats or something. Stats on it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yep, I mean, when you surveyed it, you sort of figured out that it’s just kind of a robe.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: Is there any kind of like sense magic or something that wizards can do?

speaker: Clint
lines: I have sense magic.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Crosstalk] There’s an arcana check—

speaker: Justin
lines: There’s a spell, there’s a— I have a detect magic spell but I don’t really wanna do it, because I think I would have gotten a five—

speaker: Griffin
lines: You up-up-up! Also have an arcana check that you can make.

speaker: Justin
lines: Ohh, I’ll make an arcana check. Why not?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: It just seems to me that there’s something about this staff and robe that, why is everything else… rotted away but it’s remained.

speaker: Justin
lines: Uh, arcan— oh my.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Probably pretty good.

speaker: Justin
lines: I got a 1, so I don’t know if it’s— I try to eat it, but I can’t.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Chuckles] Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Since I’m lookin’ at it, can I do an arcana check?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah sure, screw it.

speaker: Clint
lines: I got a 2. [Laughter]

speaker: Travis
lines: What’s your plusses?

speaker: Griffin
lines: None of you can quite figure this out.

speaker: Travis
lines: Wait, I’m gonna roll now. Hold on.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’re gonna make a fucking arcana check?

speaker: Travis
lines: I got an 11.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, it’s magical, the cane.

speaker: Travis
lines: Sweet.

speaker: Clint
lines: I’m gonna take the cane.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: Wait, hold on. Just cause it’s magic doesn’t mean it’s good magic.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright, wait a minute, I know what you're gonna say but I’m gonna do it anyway.

speaker: Clint
lines: I’m gonna cast detect magic.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Would that not identify the magic? [Mumbling] “Use your action to—”

speaker: Griffin
lines: I already told you it’s a magic cane.

speaker: Clint
lines: “You learn its school of magic if any.”

speaker: Griffin
lines: You cast detect magic on the cane and your mind starts to sort of swirl. You get like, dizzy and faint, because detect magic is a pretty basic spell that you’ve used quite a few times, but you’ve never really gotten a response from it like this, because the response you got was everything. It’s all schools of magic. It’s all of the magic that there is. Seems to be somehow embedded in this cane.

speaker: Travis
lines: Cool.

speaker: Justin
lines: Cool.

speaker: Taako
lines: So what did you, what did you— what kind of vibe did you get from it?

speaker: Merle
lines: [Cowboy voice] Well I’ll tell ya, pilgrim.

speaker: Taako
lines: I’m dying.

speaker: Taako
lines: I’m literally dead. Rest in peace.

speaker: Travis
lines: You were the one who wanted character voices!

speaker: Taako
lines: I take it all back.

speaker: Taako
lines: Taako didn’t, Justin did!

speaker: Merle
lines: [Regular Clint voice] I’m uh, I’m kinda, uh, mind-blown right now, it’s like kind of hard for me to— to concentrate. I think I oughta wrap this in something and carry it instead of holdin’ on to it.

speaker: Taako
lines: Well wrap it in the robe, that’s a good idea.

speaker: Merle
lines: Oh, let’s wrap it in the robe.

speaker: Taako
lines: Wrap it in the robe.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright, I wrap it in the robe.

speaker: Taako
lines: And bring it along.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Even through the robe, as soon as you touch the cane, you feel a sort of jolt go through your body. And I—

speaker: Travis
lines: Like the soft drink?

speaker: Griffin
lines: No. And I want you to actually enter into an intellect contest, with the cane.

speaker: Clint
lines: Fine.

speaker: Griffin
lines: So, you’re gonna roll a d20 and add your intellect modifier.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright, hold on one second…

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Rolls] Oh Jesus, good luck.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I also rolled a 19.

speaker: Justin
lines: Wait, wait wait, he’s also got an intelligence modifier, right?

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah—

speaker: Clint
lines: Zero.

speaker: Justin
lines: Zero.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The cane has a +2. So the cane actually beat you out. You are flung backwards by a wave of force and you just sort of thunk into the far wall of the room and you’re gonna take, one— 1d4 damage from that.

speaker: Taako
lines: Oh golly.

speaker: Griffin
lines: That’s 2 damage that you take. So it’s— it almost feels like the cane has rejected you.

speaker: Taako
lines: Let me give it a whirl. I’ll try the exact same thing that he just did.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay, I wanna paint a picture for what just happened. So Merle grabs it, gets flung across the room and takes damage, and Taako goes, [imitates voice] “my turn!” [laughs] and just reaches for it!

speaker: Taako
lines: I live like I’m dyin’.

speaker: Merle
lines: [Loud groans of pain]

speaker: Taako
lines: Let’s do this!

speaker: Merle
lines: [Louder groans of pain]

speaker: Taako
lines: You’re fine… Walk it off! Walk it off.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Rolls] Uh, okay, you have a much better chance this time.

speaker: Travis
lines: I would like— also like to picture that the whole time this is happening Magnus is just looking at the door as a dwarf flies across the room behind him.

speaker: Griffin
lines: What did you get?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, I only got a 6. Um. So you have bested this cane. And suddenly— it’s almost like the goddamn quickening happens in this room. There are bolts of lightning shooting out of Taako as he pulls this cane from the grip of the skeleton. And as you remove it from where it’s sort of had it enveloped in its robe, as you pull it out you realize that it wasn’t actually the end of a cane, it was the handle of an umbrella. And you pull this umbrella from the skeleton’s grasp. The skeleton actually looks up at you, almost like it’s acknowledging your presence. And as you finally wrest it from its grasp, the skeleton and the bright crimson robe both disintegrate into ashes.

speaker: Taako
lines: … So now I have an umbrella.

speaker: Merle
lines: I’m in a lot of pain over here.

speaker: Taako
lines: Uh, you’re a cleric, right?

speaker: Merle
lines: Oh yeah.

speaker: Taako
lines: Walk it off.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You realize that Gundren is sort of looking at Taako agape, like,

speaker: Gundren
lines: What the shit. What the shit was all that lightning stuff about. And the magic umbrella. You guys are crazy!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Oh hey, nice umbrella!

speaker: Justin
lines: I look at Gundren and say,

speaker: Taako
lines: Handle it! That’s how I do.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay so, Gundren says uh—, Gundren puts his hand on the door and very slowly the gears of the door start turning, and while those gears are turning, he looks at you and says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: You guys deserve some answers.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Yeah!

speaker: Taako
lines: Please.

speaker: Magnus
lines: And some money.

speaker: Gundren
lines: Well, maybe, yeah I— yes. Okay. Um. My father…

speaker: Clint
lines: Wait, hold one second. I have a thing called “Zone of Truth”…

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Amused] Okay.

speaker: Travis
lines: Sure you do.

speaker: Clint
lines: In the Zone of Truth, it’s a 15 foot radius— I gotta tell ya, this— I think it’s important we get the truth outta my cousin here.

speaker: Justin
lines: [In Taako voice] No, I think that’s a great play, go for it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright, I have to, um…

speaker: Griffin
lines: You say, you say, “hold on one second, Gundren, excuse me for a second, AAACHOOzoneoftruth!”

speaker: Griffin
lines: You try to hide it under your breath.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright.

speaker: Travis
lines: “What did you say, Zone of Truth?” “I did. Shit. I meant to lie, aawww.”

speaker: Clint
lines: He’s gomake a charisma saving throw.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. He’s probably not especially charismatic, we’ll say he has a +0. What does he have to beat?

speaker: Clint
lines: Hold on.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Probably a 13, right? He rolled a 4, plus 0 is 4, so he’s telling the truth now?

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay. Uh…

speaker: Gundren
lines: Whoa… did you guys feel that?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Feel what? Nope.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Well you would have to tell the truth.

speaker: Travis
lines: No, only he’s feeling it!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Is it targeted, or is it everybody in the zone, are we all telling the truth now?

speaker: Clint
lines: Everybody in a 15-foot radius—

speaker: Travis
lines: Aw, dammit.

speaker: Clint
lines: —has to—

speaker: Gundren
lines: Did you just cast some sort of magic spell on me?

speaker: Merle
lines: [Impulsively] Yes!

speaker: Gundren
lines: [Incredulous] O-kay! That’s weird, I don’t really cotton to that, but uh—

speaker: Merle
lines: Well I’m pissed off because you’re the one that sent us on this mission to get our asses kicked because you just admitted you didn’t think we could do it!

speaker: Gundren
lines: You’ve got every right, listen, we’ve gotta get through this fuckin’ episode—

speaker: Taako
lines: [Distressed] I stole a bunch of gold!

speaker: Taako
lines: I stole a bunch of gold, there was a whole thing of gold—

speaker: Merle
lines: He did! He did! I wasn’t supposed to see him but I saw it!

speaker: Travis
lines: Wait, is this compulsive truth or is it just like when we speak?

speaker: Taako
lines: I— I— I opened my mouth to lie about gold.

speaker: Taako
lines: I was just gonna remark about how we haven’t found any gold this whole time and how we were really upset about it but I’m sorry! I found a bunch of gold and here’s a third of the gold!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Gundren gives a—

speaker: Magnus
lines: I’m having a really great time and I think we’re becoming closer as friends!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Gundren looks over Magnus, he’s like,

speaker: Gundren
lines: That’s very sweet. Your boots look weirdly familiar, where did you get those?

speaker: Taako
lines: [Crosstalk] We stole your magic boots!

speaker: Magnus
lines: [Crosstalk] They were given to me as a gift!

speaker: Merle
lines: Shut up, Taako!

speaker: Taako
lines: [High-pitched and distressed] We stole your magic boots, too!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Nope!

speaker: Gundren
lines: Oh, those were Tharden’s magic boots, I think. Aw, I hate—

speaker: Taako
lines: We stole Tharden’s magic boots…

speaker: Merle
lines: He’s dead!

speaker: Gundren
lines: I hated that guy, keep ‘em. Yeah, I know, I’m not crazy about that. Anyways, exposition time. My father, Cyrus Rockseeker was the—

speaker: Merle
lines: My uncle.

speaker: Gundren
lines: Your uncle, yes, was in charge of security for Wave Echo Cave. And when the orc marauders came to destroy Phandalin and seek out the Wave Echo Cave and take it over, he managed to very heroically lock away all of the magical items, magical weapons, equipment, trinkets, everything, away in the mine’s personal vault, which is here behind me. Unfortunately in order to do so, he also had to… lock himself in. So he sadly sacrificed himself.

speaker: Taako
lines: You okay?

speaker: Magnus
lines: You know for a Zone of Truth, you’re using a lot of adverbs. How do you know it was sadly? That’s not truth, that’s subjective.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I was a bit sad about it. Fine. Some would say sadly, uh, he sacrificed himself to lock away all of the treasures of this vault.

speaker: Merle
lines: So he goes all Scrooge McDuck, how long ago?

speaker: Gundren
lines: Uh… this was about a decade ago.

speaker: Merle
lines: [Softly] Damn those orc marauders.

speaker: Gundren
lines: Yeah there’s no way that I’m gonna open this door and have a happy family reunion, but fortunately—

speaker: Travis
lines: I lean over to Taako,

speaker: Magnus
lines: [Whispering] Can you eat gold to stay alive?

speaker: Griffin
lines: No answer to that? Just too dumb, too dumb to answer.

speaker: Taako
lines: [Chuckling] Too dumb— I was worried that if I answered he might respond [Clint laughs] and that would prolong the conversation.

speaker: Taako
lines: Even for a second.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The door makes a few definitive clunks and Gundren says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: Fortunately, this door is attuned to Rockseeker blood, um, so I can open it up and we can have ourselves a field day with the treasures and weapons and everything within.

speaker: Clint
lines: I just wanna point out to ‘im that a few minutes ago— pee works too, as we found out at the spring. He could pee on the door if he wanted to.

speaker: Taako
lines: Yeah, so if you need to pee—

speaker: Gundren
lines: I’m totally cool, thanks for asking though. Kind of a weird question, kind of a weird request.

speaker: Gundren
lines: I’m regretting letting you guys into this with every passing second, but um, anyway, here we go.

speaker: Merle
lines: Too much honesty.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The door rolls open revealing a very small passageway that [someone makes door-creak noise], unlike the rest of this cave, is actually kind of dark. You remember the rock walls of the rest of this cave are sort of illuminated.

speaker: Travis
lines: Mmhm.

speaker: Griffin
lines: They sort of have a natural, magical glow about them. But for some reason whatever’s at the end of this cave this passageway, is pitch-black. And he says,

speaker: Gundren
lines: Well, here we go.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And starts to walk on through.

speaker: Magnus
lines: [Confident-sounding] Okay, some kind of light source in the tunnel may be a good idea.

speaker: Clint
lines: Is that your voice?

speaker: Travis
lines: That’s my Magnus voice.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I just—

speaker: Justin
lines: Oh, my god.

speaker: Griffin

They are dressed in pretty raggedy clothes but they have, y’know, swords, daggers, some weapons on them. And one of them turns away from the cart and sees Magnus rushing towards and say

speaker: Scavenger
lines: [In a hillbilly accent] Oh hey, some guys, yo, hey! Slow your roll! Slow your roll, pard’ner! Uh, we’re just— we’re just pickin’ the bones of this scene, we didn’t do any of this, we promise. We’re just tryin’ to— four honest, y’know, fools tryin’ to make a buck, tryin’ to turn a buck in this hard, cold world. Certainly y’all three can sympathize with that.

speaker: Clint
lines: Alright, how far away are we?

speaker: Magnus
lines: [Crosstalk] I respect your motivations and we don’t have a lot of time for this. Give me the boy and we’ll be on our way.

speaker: Scavenger
lines: Aw, what’re you gonna do with a orc boy, huh? You gonna— you gonna train him up to be your ward? He’s not some pet dog that you can adopt, I know how bad you want one of them. What’re you—

speaker: Magnus
lines: Then why do you have him in a cage?

speaker: Scavenger
lines: For sellin’!

speaker: Taako
lines: What do you think happens to him after you sell him?

speaker: Scavenger
lines: That’s not my problem, I get the money for sellin’ the boy!

speaker: Taako
lines: Listen, I’m gonna give you to three, we really got a lot to do—

speaker: Griffin
lines: He says,

speaker: Scavenger
lines: [Interrupting] I’m ah— ah— I’m gonna say some cool shit now.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He says,

speaker: Scavenger
lines: Me n’ my posse gonna give you ta two!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And, all—

speaker: Magnus
lines: We’ll give you to one!

speaker: Scavenger
lines: Well how ‘bout this? Zero, motherfuckers!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And they all draw their weapons.

speaker: Travis
lines: Cool.

speaker: Clint
lines: I cast Thaumaturgy!

speaker: Justin
lines: Wait no, you gotta—

speaker: Griffin
lines: No, it’s—

speaker: Justin
lines: You gotta roll for initiative.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Clint
lines: Oh.

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah it’s gotten to this point.

speaker: Griffin
lines: [Crosstalk] Battle time. You just— the screen just sort of got like all pixelated and you heard the [mimics encounter noise] and that’s how you know that like you’ve just entered into a random encounter.

speaker: Travis
lines: Are— do we think that for Magnus taking his nap, that was his short rest to regain hitpoints?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, you guys were all on a pretty long ride, so we’ll say that counted as a short rest. It was a very restful ride. So you guys can roll hit die to—

speaker: Justin
lines: Except for the fact that we were following the trail of flaming dwarf, it was all really chill.

speaker: Clint
lines: I rolled a 17 initiative.

speaker: Travis
lines: I did as well.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Who has the higher— what are your modifiers?

speaker: Travis
lines: Mine is +2

speaker: Clint
lines: Mine’s -1.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, so Travis goes first.

speaker: Clint
lines: What did Travis have?

speaker: Griffin
lines: You guys have the same score, but in the case of a tie whoever has the highest modifier goes first. Juice, what’d you get?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Kay.

speaker: Justin
lines: That was in character, he just said “15” and no one knew why.

speaker: Justin
lines: Roll to see if they’re unnerved.

speaker: Travis
lines: [Laughs] “They’re shouting numbers, get outta here!”

speaker: Justin
lines: Griffin, when you have four opponents like this, do they each get their own initiative roll or do they just sort of act collaboratively.

speaker: Griffin
lines: I roll an initiative roll for each discrete type of enemy you’re fighting.

speaker: Justin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: So if you were fighting some bandits, and a bear, and a bugbear… but there were like 14 bugbears, I would only roll one bugbear roll.

speaker: Clint
lines: But right now we’re fighting the equivalent of dumpster divers, right?

speaker: Griffin
lines: These are actually ruffians, bandits.

speaker: Clint
lines: Ohh.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah. These—

speaker: Clint
lines: [Rolls R] Rrrruffians.

speaker: Griffin
lines: These people aren’t too worried about their [sarcastic] carbon footprint as much as they are, you know, plundering. Pillaging. First in the order is actually Killian. Killian says,

speaker: Killian
lines: Let’s keep thi—

speaker: Travis
lines: Wait, what’d Taako roll?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Taako rolled a 15.

speaker: Justin
lines: 15 and I shouted it out loud.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Killian got a natural 20. She goes,

speaker: Killian
lines: Hey guys, let’s try and make this quick.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And then she whips out her crossbow and fires a projectile. This is the first time that you’ve really seen her giant mega-crossbow in action where it hasn’t been sort of stymied by a flaming magic dwarf. And it fires a bolt a size of a short spear at the lead ruffian that was trying to intimidate you with his countdown. She rolls a 12 plus 6 which is 18 which beats their armour class. And it does… oh god, 14 points of damage. He— the bolt hits him and it actually sends him flying back about 10 feet. It is a very powerful blow and he lands prone, but still alive. Next in the order is Travis. Oh wait— hold on wait, I wrote a T— yeah that stands for… that’s Magnus.

speaker: Travis
lines: Okay, I’m gonna two-handed battleaxe at whichever one’s closest to me.

speaker: Griffin
lines: There are two sort of close to the wagon where the thing is locked up, which is also—

speaker: Travis
lines: The thing?

speaker: Griffin
lines: The— where the orc boy—

speaker: Travis
lines: Griffin!

speaker: Griffin
lines: —is locked up that’s about 20 feet away where the now injured ruffian just landed. There’s another one that sorta had that guy’s back who’s probably the closest. He’s about 10 feet out from you.

speaker: Travis
lines: Great. I step up to him. Two-handed battleaxe. Oh wait, gotta roll the right dice… 24.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh yeah, god.

speaker: Travis
lines: And it does 1d10 plus 4… 13 points of damage.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Holy shit.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Griffin
lines: As you approach him he’s like,

speaker: Ruffian
lines: Bring it on, tough-guy!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And then you hit him and he’s like,

speaker: Ruffian
lines: Don’t.

speaker: Ruffian
lines: Hold up… ohh, hold up. Oh dang. Ohhh dang. Oh dang…

speaker: Clint
lines: Is this Jesco White?

speaker: Ruffian
lines: Ohhh daaang.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He’s alive, but dang. Next in the order is Merle. You got two severely wounded ruffians and the two by the cart that are still full health.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay. I am going to cast Thaumaturgy, it’s a cantrip, which allows my voice to boom up to three times as loud as normal for a minute. And I’m going to yell,

speaker: Merle
lines: There’s only four of ‘em! Platoon… One, attack from the east! Platoon Two, attack from the west!

speaker: Clint
lines: Which echoes, down the hill.

speaker: Griffin
lines: The two full-health ruff— I’m gonna say you’re making an intimidation check. Why don’t you actually roll that, and I’ll give you advantage since you made your voice very loud and believable.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, lemme check.

speaker: Griffin
lines: And these guys are gonna make a, we’ll say an intelligence check against, they have -1 intelligence so that should go fairly poorly. [Rolls] Yup!

speaker: Clint
lines: You said an intelligence check?

speaker: Griffin
lines: They’re making an intelligence check to combat your intimidation.

speaker: Justin
lines: Yeah your intimidation.

speaker: Clint
lines: Oh, okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Cause you’re lying to them essentially.

speaker: Clint
lines: Uh, 9.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay.

speaker: Justin
lines: What would be his modifier on an intimidation check, Griffin?

speaker: Travis
lines: Intimidation is one of the skills.

speaker: Griffin
lines: There’s an intimidation skill.

speaker: Justin
lines: Oh.

speaker: Clint
lines: Uh, plus 3. So 12.

speaker: Griffin
lines: They only got a 4, so that is sufficient. The two ruffians by their cart look at each other, they look at the boss who’s lying on the ground with a spear-sized bolt in his stomach, and say,

speaker: Ruffians
lines: Whadda we do?

speaker: Griffin
lines: He’s like,

speaker: Scavenger
lines: [Exhausted, clinging to life] I don’t— I don’t know man, I gue— I guess, I guess go check it out?

speaker: Griffin
lines: And so the two ruffians split off to the east and west and start [chuckles] running in. either direction looking for these reinforcements to come.

speaker: Taako
lines: Guys, did you hear that? Did you hear from the hills? There’s an army supporting us! I think we’re gonna win this thing!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Yeah, Taako, definitely. [sighs]

speaker: Clint
lines: Dear, sweet Taako.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Next in the order is Taako himself, the man the myth the legend.

speaker: Taako
lines: The fuck, I don’t even have to do anything! [Pause] Roll to chill!

speaker: Taako
lines: Chill check!

speaker: Justin
lines: No, I’ll go ahead and I’ll give ‘em a little magic missile.

speaker: Griffin
lines: To which one, you’ve got two injured ones and the other two have run off’d.

speaker: Justin
lines: They’re splitsville. I’ll do two bolts for one of the injured and one bolt for the other one.

speaker: Clint
lines: Really badly injured one.

speaker: Justin
lines: And that’s a d…

speaker: Griffin
lines: It’s a d4 plus 1. You only roll it once and that’s the result that you use for all of them.

speaker: Griffin
lines: 4 damage? Yeah you don't even need two bolts on either of those two dudes. They were— they had 3 and 2 health respectively, so they are both nixed. Stevie Nixed, these two are. Congratulations you solved my bandit puzzle.

speaker: Travis
lines: [Laughter] Alright we pop open the cage, say “hop in the cart”, check their cart real quick, any good shit?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um…

speaker: Justin
lines: This is good, now we own a boy.

speaker: Travis
lines: No man can own another man, Justin! We’ve freed a boy who’s chosen to join us rather than stay out in the woods by himself.

speaker: Clint
lines: He’s an orcling.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Are you— so you’re freeing the boy? You’re freeing the orc boy?

speaker: Travis
lines: Yes?

speaker: Justin
lines: Yes?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Okay, you find some keys on one of those two dead bandits and you pop open the cage, and the orcish boy doesn’t… seem especially grateful? He sort of barely even acknowledges your presence, and he—

speaker: Clint
lines: So he’s a teenager?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay.

speaker: Griffin
lines: He’s moody, he’s listening to his Nirvana tapes… and he just sort of starts to walk away. He just walks away.

speaker: Clint
lines: So he’s an emorc?

speaker: Magnus
lines: Okay bye!

speaker: Griffin
lines: That was pretty good.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Killian is like,

speaker: Killian
lines: [Wrong voice] You ungrateful little whelp!

speaker: Griffin
lines: Woah wait, that’s my Gundren voice. I’m getting groggy already! She says,

speaker: Killian
lines: Wow what a… what an ungra— what an ingrate. What a jerk. Gah, kids these days. Orc kids these days, I tell ya.

speaker: Taako
lines: Did you know him?

speaker: Killian
lines: Are you kidding— now who’s the orcist? [Mocking voice] “Yeah, d’you, oh, do you, uh, do you know Steven? He’s an orc too.”

speaker: Clint
lines: “He’s orc too!”

speaker: Killian
lines: “Hey I know an orc named Steven, do you know him?” That’s what you sound like right now, Taako!

speaker: Magnus
lines: We don’t have time for this.

speaker: Taako
lines: I… I don’t know a Steven.

speaker: [Theme music
lines: Déjà Vu by Mort Garson]
